00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: input
00003 !
00008 
00009 module input
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public read_input
00014 
00015 contains
00016 
00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! READ_INPUT
00021 
00022   subroutine read_input
00023 
00024     use global,           only: nhistories,seed,source_type,mat,emin,emax
00025     use materials,        only: setup_material,load_source,load_isotope
00026     use xml_data_input_t
00027 
00028     ! local variables
00029     logical                        :: file_exists  ! see if file exists
00030     character(255)                 :: filename     ! filename to open
00031     real(8)                        :: N            ! temp number dens
00032     real(8)                        :: A            ! temp atomic weight
00033     character(255)                 :: path         ! path to isotope file
00034     logical                        :: thermal      ! contains thermal lib
00035     integer                        :: i            ! iteration counter
00036 
00037     ! check for input file
00038     filename = "input.xml"
00039     inquire(FILE=trim(filename), EXIST=file_exists)
00040     if (.not. file_exists) then
00041       write(*,*) 'Cannot read input file!'
00042       stop
00043     else
00044 
00045       ! tell user
00046       write(*,'(A/)') "Reading INPUT XML file..."
00047 
00048     end if
00049 
00050     ! read in input file
00051     call read_xml_file_input_t(trim(filename))
00052 
00053     ! read in settings
00054     nhistories = settings_%histories
00055     seed = settings_%seed
00056     source_type = settings_%source_type
00057     mat%nisotopes = size(material_(1)%nuclides)
00058 
00059     ! load the source
00060     call load_source(mat,source_type,settings_%source_path)
00061 
00062     ! set up the material object
00063     call setup_material(mat,emin,emax)
00064 
00065     ! begin loop over isotope materials
00066     do i = 1,mat%nisotopes
00067 
00068       ! extract info
00069       N = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%N
00070       A = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%A
00071       path = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%path
00072       thermal = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%thermal
00073 
00074       ! load the isotope into memory
00075       call load_isotope(mat,N,A,path,thermal)
00076 
00077     end do
00078 
00079   end subroutine read_input
00080 
00081 end module input
